name: Perfect Skin!
description:
Upgrade your center, customize your character, and make your clients look amazing with the unique game plays of Perfect Skin!
Perfect Skin is a skin care center simulator with oddly satisfying games and care center & character customizations with hundreds of different items.
You will serve your customer, upgrade your room, and unlock the entire center!
You will even have little cute snails to cure rashes!

Game Features:
Serve your customers with hundreds of different game plays!
Customize your skin care professional!
Complete the decoration of your room with endless combinations!
Unlock other rooms by completing the current one!
Complete all levels and be the owner of an entire skin care center!

What You Have:
Character upgrades with different hair types, hair colors and clothes
Room upgrades including all furnitures, decoratives and miscellaneous items
Amazing mini games to fix and order your stuff
Acne, blackhead, rash, discoloration treatments in a unique way
Hair and eyebrow removal, foot peeling
Spider Vein treatment with laser
VIP customers, who can boost your earnings in a second!
And happy customers with a Perfect Skin!

Clients can’t wait to get to your Perfect Salon!
publishers: CUBE GAMES YAZILIM SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
